entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
